fields.summary: Content: Custom AI Development PPC Page
Design: Custom AI Development PPC Page

issuetype.description: A small piece of work that's part of a larger task.
issuetype.name: Sub-task

content.text: We need to create a high-converting PPC landing page focused on promoting our AI development services. The goal is to generate high-quality leads that convert into paying customers from industries.
Also, I have attached keywords list for your reference. Keywords Sheet Link:
Let me know if you need any additional information, looking forward to seeing your ideas and drafts.
I will share the page today EOD.
maam. Please take a look the PPC page.
Hire Custom AI Developers_PPC Landing Page
Ive pulled together the core angles for the AI page that I believe make it stand out from a typical service pitch:
intelligence that feels natural to the end user.
business-first use cases, not features for the sake of it.
prototypes and pilots to reduce AI project failure.
our own AI agent in action (dogfooding builds credibility).
solutions built around client workflows and data, not generic templates.
Let me know what do you think.
this could work but lets see what the PPC team has to say as well.
Hire Custom AI Developers_PPC Landing Page.docx

Ive reworked the banner section, introduced an industry-focused segment, and added a tools and technology section. I also toned down the Sheela angle, making the overall page clearer and more accessible for non-technical readers. Please share your feedback.
looks fine , just rework a couple of headlines. run them past me on Teams.
I have removed the friction from the banner and the 2nd section. Also, instead of using words like Native, I have kept it simple and universal.
I have found 9 keywords and the same has been updated in sheet, can you please check for the remaining onw.
update the same in keywords sheet, 10 keywords found.
Not sure what you mean. The keyword is already there in the sheet.
yes, I have said that I updated in the keywords sheet that 10 keywords found. (typing error in previous reply update instead of updated).
Ok great. But I can see that you have assigned the page back to me. Is there anything left for me to do?
maam has approved the page (with the new headlines). So, if theres nothing else, we can move forward.
please look into this and proceed as per.
I have added a comment for banner headline and service section headline , please have a look in content draft.
Mam, you can also have a look.
. Have received feedback from the SME and have implemented the same.
Hire Custom AI Developers_PPC Landing Page.docx
Hi , please roll back the content drafts as I am unable to see my comments.

I think due to some constraints, rolling back isnt an option. You had added two comments earlierone regarding the banner (which Ive already updated), and another for the service section where you felt it wasnt clear that we were talking about AI developers.
In this case, though, the focus of the section is more on the
rather than on the developers themselves. Thats why I believe the headline
AI Mindfully Applied Exactly Where You Need It
is actually apt, since it reflects the positioning of the offering.
. In this version, you can find your comments and my replies.
Hire Custom AI Developers_PPC Landing Page NEW
Well consider this the final version, unless there are any changes from your side.
and I have already finalized the banner headline and sub-headline mentioned in the content draft. For the service headline, we will review it during the design phase.
